response.homeDescription: Relax on the grand porch of your gorgeous restored craftsman in the heart of the Piedmont Neighborhood. Lots of room in this 3BR/2BA home, with a large bonus room which is a perfect office, media room, or 4th non-conforming bedroom. Enjoy breakfast in the sunny kitchen with steel appliances and custom island cooktop which leads into the fully fenced back and front yards. Gleaming hardwood floors and details full of character. Living room with gas firelpace and wired for surround sound. Updated systems and unfinished basement with plenty of storage. Close to Peninsula Park, New Seasons, Coffee, Restaurants, and more!
response.whatOwnerLoves: This beautiful craftsman has been restored for a modern lifestyle with all of it's charm intact. The beauty of the past with the closet sizes of the future! :) The layout is extremely functional with 2 bedrooms and a bathroom with a tub upstairs, and a 3rd bedroom + 4th non-conforming bedroom or office and another bathroom with tub on the main. Front and back yard are fenced and there is so much nearby in the Piedmont Neighborhood. Walkscore lists this location as a biker's paradise with a 13 minute drive downtown. Probably my favorite feature of this home is the front porch of your dreams. I could sit out there all summer watching the world go by.
